name: Red Forest (Alexander James)
description:
Red Forest is an experimental game.

In this game, you click balls to earn cash, use cash to buy more balls, place balls, and make them grow by clicking the other balls.

Controls
Left Mouse Button - Place Ball, Click Ball
Right Mouse Button - Place Ball
B - Buy Balls
R - Reset (Only when reached DEAD END)
S - Save Farm

F4 - Toggle Fullscreen
F9 - Screenshot
Escape - Quit
